mapper.insert: insert into schedule (user_id, date, start_hour, start_minute, end_hour, end_minute, schedule_text, state, hasReminder) values (#{user_id}, #{date}, #{start_hour},#{start_minute},#{end_hour},#{end_minute}, #{schedule_text},#{state},#{hasReminder});
mapper.select: select user_id from schedule where schedule_id=#{schedule_id};
select DATE_FORMAT(date,"%d") as day,count(*) as scheduleAmount from schedule where DATE_FORMAT(date,'%Y-%m')=#{yearmonth} and user_id=#{user_id} GROUP BY day;
